oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Intoxicacion Experimental En El Ganado Vacuno Por Quercus Spp.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Prieto, F.
Fidalgo, L. E.
Goicoa, A.
Santamarina, G.
Hernandez, J.
Benedito, J. L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tanines
oak acorn
Quercus spp
intoxications
blood parameters
clinical signs
lesional signs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have studied and compared a "natural" and "experimental" intoxications by tanines in beef and dairy cows wich ingested oak acorn of Quercus spp. In both cases we have analized the evolution of some blood parameter, and we established their relations with clinical and lesional signs. It's impossible for us to reproduce the experimental form as a natural intoxication by supplied to the animals some dry acorn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 336-340
